title: American Report on Pan-African Conference MCQ 1

content.question: The conference as described in the first and second paragraphs is best explained in the context of which of the following developments in the aftermath of the Second World War?

choices.label: The development of regional free-trade agreements
The intensification of ethnic rivalries in Africa
The spread of industrial methods of production

topic.text: 8.1: Setting the Stage for the Cold War and Decolonization

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
